greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the duration of the Julian year in SI seconds
comment: This is an assigned metrological constant. Regarding these, see A003678 for general context notes, references and links. - Stanislav Sykora, Jun 16 2012.
Together with the speed of light (A003678) it defines the distance of one light-year (A213614).
Julian year continues to be preferred to Gregorian year in astronomy.
results.author: _Stanislav Sykora_, Jun 16 2012
